item.title: Patterns and Practices for SPFx Development
item.description: When building any solution, whether it is SPFx-based or with any other programming language, it is best to make it loosely coupled to achieve easy maintenance and scalability.
When building any solution, whether it is SPFx-based or with any other programming language, it is best to make it loosely coupled to achieve easy maintenance and scalability.
item.dc:creator: Dipesh Bhanani
